code: import Andy from'../assets/Andy.png';import Angela from'../assets/Angela.png';import Dwight from'../assets/Dwight.png';import Jim from'../assets/Jim.png';import Kelly from'../assets/Kelly.png';import Michael from'../assets/Michael.png';import Pam from'../assets/Pam.png';import Stanley from'../assets/Stanley.png';import Creed from'../assets/Creed.png';import Kevin from'../assets/Kevin.png';import Meredith from'../assets/Meredith.png';import Oscar from'../assets/Oscar.png';import Phyllis from'../assets/Phyllis.png';import Ryan from'../assets/Ryan.png';import Toby from'../assets/Toby.png';import quotes from'../assets/quotes.json';export var fetchQuotes=function fetchQuotes(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:'FETCH_QUOTES',payload:{quotes:quotes}});};};export var getImages=function getImages(){return function(dispatch){var images=[Andy,Angela,Dwight,Jim,Kelly,Michael,Pam,Stanley,Creed,Kevin,Meredith,Oscar,Phyllis,Ryan,Toby];dispatch({type:'GET_IMAGES',payload:images});};};export var onSelect=function onSelect(key){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:'SELECT',payload:key});};};
